q_en: What sewing tasks will be completed before May 31, 2024?

steps.sql: SELECT m.id, m.name, m.unit, m.type FROM materials m JOIN product_material pm ON m.id = pm.material_id JOIN products p ON pm.product_id = p.id JOIN order_product op ON p.id = op.product_id JOIN orders o ON op.order_id = o.id JOIN customers c ON o.user_id = c.id WHERE c.customer_name = 'Olivia';
steps.description: To find out what materials were used in Olivia's order, we need to retrieve the material information associated with the products in Olivia's order. We will first find Olivia's order ID, then identify the product IDs in that order, and finally list the materials used in those products.",

response: I'm sorry, but I couldn't find any specific information related to the completion of tasks by the 'Skilled Sewers' working group before May 31, 2024. If you have any other questions or need assistance with something else, feel free to ask! üòä
